name: PHASESpatialPipelineEntry
desc: An audio layer with an adjustable volume for a spatial mixer's output.

items.name: var sendLevel: Double
items.desc: The amount of audio signal to add to the output.

items.name: var sendLevelMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition?
items.desc: A parameter that gradually updates the amount of audio signal that passes through to the output.
